description: Get detailed data for a major or minor version of a service template.

parameters.name: majorVersion
parameters.description: To get service template major version detail data, include major Version.

parameters.name: minorVersion
parameters.description: To get service template minor version detail data, include minorVersion.

parameters.name: templateName
parameters.description: The name of the service template a version of which you want to get detailed data for.

nested_items.name: serviceTemplateVersion
nested_items.description: The detailed data of the requested service template version.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the version of a service template.

nested_items.name: compatibleEnvironmentTemplates
nested_items.description: An array of compatible environment template names for the major version of a service template.

nested_items.name: majorVersion
nested_items.description: The major version of the compatible environment template.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time when the version of a service template was created.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description of the version of a service template.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedAt
nested_items.description: The time when the version of a service template was last modified.

nested_items.name: majorVersion
nested_items.description: The latest major version that's associated with the version of a service template.

nested_items.name: minorVersion
nested_items.description: The minor version of a service template.

nested_items.name: recommendedMinorVersion
nested_items.description: The recommended minor version of the service template.

nested_items.name: schema
nested_items.description: The schema of the version of a service template.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: A service template version status message.

nested_items.name: supportedComponentSources
nested_items.description: An array of supported component sources. Components with supported sources can be attached to service instances based on this service template version.

nested_items.name: templateName
nested_items.description: The name of the version of a service template.
